title: The Writer's Almanac for Sunday, April 17, 2022
description: "The sentence is my primary element, my tool, goal, bliss. Each new sentence is a heart-in-the mouth experiment."  -- novelist and essayist Cynthia Ozick, was born on this day in 1928.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "The sentence is my primary element, my tool, goal, bliss. Each new sentence is a heart-in-the mouth experiment."  -- novelist and essayist Cynthia Ozick, was born on this day in 1928.
